word: God's word is indeed a light shining amidst the moral darkness. And in our sanitariums, above all other places, the religion of Christ is to be clearly exemplified. This is why I have urged that many small sanitariums be established in places out of the cities, that men and women may hear and understand the word of the Lord, and be brought under a special, direct influence from heaven.--Letter 181, 1904, pp. 1, 3. (To Mrs. Lucinda Hall, May 26, 1904.)
